description.value:
You weave magic in unique and confounding ways. If your next action is to Cast a Spell which requires a spell attack roll, attempt a check using the skill matching the spell’s  tradition, comparing the result to the Perception DC of the spell’s target.

@UUID[Macro.nFMVsGy8rjOqxFDq]{Tricky Magic}

Critical Success: The magic is especially confounding, opening up many avenues to sneak magic past the target’s defenses. The target is off-guard against your spell attacks for 1 minute.

@UUID[Item.YZmEmzLsgLVe7rmn]{Tricky Magic (Critical Success)}

Success: Your strange casting catches the target off guard. The target is off-guard against the spell attack.

Critical Failure: You get lost in the intricacies of your own magic. You become off-guard until the start of your next turn.
